short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy and paste text symbols & emoji.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Best extension for text symbols, signs and emoji with one click to copy and paste and select multiple option. Also, you can select multiple symbols at one time. 
You can use these symbols in different social media like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, tumbler, Blog post, and Emails. 
There are different types of symbols like,
1. Heart Symbols
2. Star Symbols
3. Smiley Face
4. Music Symbols
5. Sun And Moon
6. Arrows symbol and more.
By using this copy and paste symbols extension, you will be able to access different types of symbols in one place.
